vote.title: Authorize acquisition from Jeffrey Ray Bishop and Mark Flanery of a tract of land containing approximately 342,106 square feet, improved with commercial structures and supporting facilities, located on Rector Street near its intersection with East Kiest Boulevard for the Dallas Floodway Extension Project - Not to exceed $4,142,004.00 ($4,120,004.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $22,000.00) - Financing: Flood Protection and Storm Drainage Facilities Fund (2006 General Obligation Bond Fund) ($22,000.00) and Trinity River Corridor Fund (1998 General Obligation Bond Fund) ($4,120,004.00)
vote.description: Authorize acquisition from Jeffrey Ray Bishop and Mark Flanery of a tract of land containing approximately 342,106 square feet, improved with commercial structures and supporting facilities, located on Rector Street near its intersection with East Kiest Boulevard for the Dallas Floodway Extension Project - Not to exceed $4,142,004.00 ($4,120,004.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $22,000.00) - Financing: Flood Protection and Storm Drainage Facilities Fund (2006 General Obligation Bond Fund) ($22,000.00) and Trinity River Corridor Fund (1998 General Obligation Bond Fund) ($4,120,004.00)
